title: Axis Bank inks USD 150 mn partial guarantee pact with ADB to support supply chain financing - Economic Times
content: Axis Bank inks USD 150 mn partial guarantee pact with ADB to support supply chain financing  Economic Times
description: Axis Bank has signed a partial guarantee facility agreement (PGFA) with ADB to support supply chain financing for impact sectors, under which ADB will provide guarantees (variable) to the lending done by Axis Bank, the bank said in a release.
